title: Improve search, sorting and display for connection using TAG
author: xufux
body_snippet:
<!-- Feature Request -->

<!-- If you file a feature request, please delete the bug section -->

What about adding a TAG field for connections ?

let me illustrate this 
- server01 tag= backup
- server02 tag=DC, DHCP
- server03 tag=DC, File
- server04 tag=DEV

Then in the related textbox, if i enter DC, the connection list will be refresh so that only server02 and 03 displayed.
if filtered with "DC, File" then only the server03 is visible
